mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE_NAME, HASHTAG, IMG_PATH, USER_ID, R.RECIPE_NO FROM T4_USER_RECIPE UR LEFT JOIN T4_RECIPE R ON R.RECIPE_NO = UR.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN T4_R_IMAGE I ON R.RECIPE_NO = I.RECIPE_NO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND THUMBNAIL_YN ='Y'

SELECT A.FUNDING_NO, FUNDING_NAME, FUNDING_SUMMARY, FUNDING_END_DT, FUNDING_GOAL_CNT, FUNDING_PRICE, CNT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), FUNDING_END_DT) AS D_DAY, IMG_PATH, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_ORG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH2, FORMAT(FUNDING_PRICE , 0) AS FUNDING_PRICE2, THUMBNAIL_YN, USER_ID
FROM T4_FUNDING A LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, count(FUNDING_NO) as CNT FROM T4_FUNDING_MEMBER GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) B ON A.FUNDING_NO = B.FUNDING_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, IMG_PATH FROM T4_F_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) C ON A.FUNDING_NO = C.FUNDING_NO LEFT JOIN T4_FUNDING_MEMBER M ON A.FUNDING_NO = M.FUNDING_NO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND FUNDING_CLOSE_YN = 'N' AND THUMNAIL_YN = 'Y'
